document_data.title: Player's Handbook Races: Tieflings
document_data.author: [[Matthew Sernett]]
document_data.mainbody:
{{quote|'''''New options and character hooks for tiefling characters.

This expansion of the [[Player's Handbook 4th edition|Player's Handbook]] core rulebook explores the infernal secrets of the [[tieflings]]. It presents D&D players with exciting new options for their tiefling characters, including unique racial feats, powers, [[:Category:Paragon paths|paragon paths]], and epic destinies. This book also includes ways to flesh out your tiefling character's background and personality.''}}
